channel.title: I now hate runescape
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XtMYWL5.png[/img]
If you look you will see where I was muted 3 years ago. I havent botted but maybe a couple hours and my fucking status bar shoots the fuck up.
gf me.

item.title: I now hate runescape
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:26, topic:480345”][quote author=jal knight link=topic=598580.msg4209622#msg4209622 date=1359350849]
I really dislike you. Your like one of those fags that dont make any sense, but tries to have an input to feel like he’s beating someone up with his gang. I got perm banned and felt like the punishment was too harsh…

I didnt realize when Jagex shut down a rsps they were perm banned? They were told if they dont shut down their server they would be sued, not have their rs account banned. Quit being a retarded stupid love.
[/quote]
The punishment was too harsh? You obviously haven’t been following the war with Jagex against bots then… You’re saying that if you caught someone cheating in your game that has been doing so for many years, you wouldn’t have taken the same action? I find that very, very hard to believe.[/quote]

Are you not seeing anything I’m saying? Where are you getting that I’ve been cheating for years?.. I just told you and everyone else I did it for a couple hours.

Read full topic

item.title: I now hate runescape
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:24, topic:480345”]I really dislike you. Your like one of those fags that dont make any sense, but tries to have an input to feel like he’s beating someone up with his gang. I got perm banned and felt like the punishment was too harsh…

I didnt realize when Jagex shut down a rsps they were perm banned? They were told if they dont shut down their server they would be sued, not have their rs account banned. Quit being a retarded stupid love.[/quote]
The punishment was too harsh? You obviously haven’t been following the war with Jagex against bots then… You’re saying that if you caught someone cheating in your game that has been doing so for many years, you wouldn’t have taken the same action? I find that very, very hard to believe.

Read full topic

item.title: I now hate runescape
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:24, topic:480345”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=598580.msg4209608#msg4209608 date=1359349066]

So you cheated, were punished, and now you’re mad about it?

Sounds like the rsps owners that get mad cause jagex shut em down.
[/quote]

I really dislike you. Your like one of those fags that dont make any sense, but tries to have an input to feel like he’s beating someone up with his gang. I got perm banned and felt like the punishment was too harsh…

I didnt realize when Jagex shut down a rsps they were perm banned? They were told if they dont shut down their server they would be sued, not have their rs account banned. Quit being a retarded stupid love.[/quote]
How you feel about me doesn’t interest me what so ever.
I wasn’t talking about you directly. You just seem to be over coincided and think every post I make has to do with you; if you have commented or made the thread itself (kind of like this one now.)
It’s a permanent ban on RSPS’s, and a fine at the same time (assuming there was no plea bargain).
Plus, it’s just a game bro, you obviously cared enough to make a topic about it on mopar. As stated before, they have loads of rules against botting. I mean come on. Haven’t you seen the bot busting updates? They really don’t seem to like that players bot. I used to bot, well… I still would if I ever cared to set up my bot account again.

Lastly, my comment wasn’t directed towards you whatsoever. It was directed to what vManlyMan said. How a person got banned, or punished, and then got mad about it.

Read full topic

I didnt realize when Jagex shut down a rsps they were perm banned? They were told if they dont shut down their server they would be sued, not have their rs account banned. Quit being a retarded stupid fuck.

item.title: I now hate runescape
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

runescape sucks:

EoC is the only big update that made me actually want to quit RS. I quit at other times, but never permanently, but they messed up too bad this time. It doesn’t feel like RuneScape anymore.

COMPLETELY agree. It’s not RS anymore. If they keep me banned I guess it’s w/e but I wanted to sell at some point.

Read full topic

item.title: I now hate runescape
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7, topic:480345”][quote author=jal knight link=topic=598580.msg4209479#msg4209479 date=1359338412]
So your telling me since 2009 I’ve been botting and just now got caught. lol stfu. I know what the rules are, im not mad, I am frustrated a bit but im not raging by any means.
[/quote]
You’re telling me to shut up because you can’t play the game legitimately and karma finally caught up to you?[/quote]
No, I’m telling you to shut up because your TELLING me I cant play with out bots. Which would be assuming I was botting since 2009.

Read full topic
